description: This Python script sets up and runs an agent that interacts with Notion via MCP tools, including environment setup, agent configuration, and execution logic.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with tools, model, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with MCP server.

classes.name: StdioServerParameters
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up server parameters for MCP.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes environment, configures the agent, and runs it.
